H0.text: when was the letter j introduced to the alphabet. 1066

H1.text: when was the letter j introduced to the alphabet. 1200

H2.text: when was the letter j introduced to the alphabet. 1380

H3.text: when was the letter j introduced to the alphabet. 1524

A4.text: J was introduced into English for the consonant in the 17th century

A5.text: Gian Giorgio Trissino explicitly distinguished I and J as separate sounds in 1524

A6.text: The first English language books to make a clear distinction between ⟨i⟩ and ⟨j⟩ were published in 1629 and 1633
